prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Book, a markdown-based language, allows users to define AI applications by specifying workflows, personas (virtual employees), and knowledge sources.  This simplifies the process of building complex AI pipelines compared to traditional coding.  It features a VSCode plugin for `.book` file support.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
